rewards.title:
Universal rewards
suits every situation
rewards.description:
In return for value creation, we put the reward-on-chain,
with a tangible asset, our token, the lum.

poweredBy.title:
Powered by
the
poweredBy.description:
Lum comes from the word “light” and expresses the value created
by and for consumers throughout the purchasing experience cycle.

It is the fuel of the Lum Network and is used by businesses to store UGC
and reward their customers, by validators and delegators to secure
the network and many more.
